answeredQuestions.target-users: Developers using TeamBot for AI-assisted development workflows
answeredQuestions.core-problem: Sequential stage execution creates unnecessary wait time when independent stages could run concurrently
answeredQuestions.solution-approach: New ParallelStageExecutor for stage-level concurrency, configurable via stages.yaml
answeredQuestions.technical-constraints: Must not break sequential workflow, separate from agent-level ParallelExecutor
answeredQuestions.existing-patterns: Follows existing orchestration patterns in execution_loop.py and stage_config.py

referencesProcessed.keyFindings: 14 stages, stage_order list, work_to_review_mapping, parallel_agents for IMPLEMENTATION
Sequential loop, single current_stage, save_state/resume methods
Agent-level parallelism with asyncio.Semaphore, execute_parallel(tasks: list[AgentTask])
Business problem, goals, success criteria, state model evolution
